Philosopher Stone Requirments:

BLACK - 1 Transmutation Circle, 28 Magic Reagents, 6 Philosopher's Stone Ore and 1 Conversion Formula.
BLUE - 1 Transmutation Circle, 30 Magic Reagents, 5 Philosopher's Stone Ore and 1 Conversion Formula.
GREEN - 1 Transmutation Circle, 6 Magic Reagents, 17 Philosopher's Stone Ore and 1 Conversion Formula.
ORANGE - 1 Transmutation Circle, 24 Magic Reagents, 8 Philosopher's Stone Ore and 1 Conversion Formula.
RED - 1 Transmutation Circle, 20 Magic Reagents, 10 Philosopher's Stone Ore and 1 Conversion Formula.
WHITE - 1 Transmutation Circle, 12 Magic Reagents, 14 Philosopher's Stone Ore and 1 Conversion Formula.

Prizes:
BLACK - Behemoth's Tunning Fork, Cabrio's Hand, Romantic Chapeau, Scroll of Focus, Scroll of Guidance, Scroll of Wind Walk, Blessed Scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Resurection, Quick Healing Potion, Greater Healing Potion
BLUE - Sobekk's Hurricane, Sword of Ipos, Piggy Hat, Scroll of Death Whisper, Scroll of Agility, Scroll of Acumen, Blessed Scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Resurection, Quick Healing Potion, Greater Healing Potion
GREEN - Themis Tongue, Shyeed's Bow, Jester Hat, Scroll of Focus, Scroll of Empower, Scroll of Wind Walk, Blessed Scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Resurection, Quick Healing Potion, Greater Healing Potion
ORANGE - Daimon Crystal, Barakiel's Axe, Wizard Hat, Scroll of Acumen, Scroll of Shield, Scroll of Haste, Blessed scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Resurection, Quick Healing Potion, Greater Healing Potion
RED - Sirra's Blade, Naga Storm, Teddy Bear Hat, Scroll of Might, Scroll of Guidance, Scroll of Haste, Blessed Scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Resurection, Quick Healing Potion, Greater Healing Potion
WHITE - Sobekk Huricane, Tiphon's Spear, Iron Circlet, Scroll of Empower, Scroll of Shield, Scroll of Death Whisper, Blessed Scroll of Escape, Blessed Scroll of Reusrection, Quick Healing Potion, greater Healing Potion
